course_description: A study of the origins, development, and theological distinctions of the various strands of the Baptist tradition from its origins in England to its flourishing in the United States and spread to other parts of the world. Does not fulfill area requirements.
sections: Class Nbr: 5043, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-8p, Instructor: A. Weaver, Status: Open
